main event: A round, red glare was observed in Anoka, Minnesota on 26 July 1955.
interesting points: The object was described as a light bulb size, appearing as a bright glare,The observation lasted for forty minutes,One witness reported it was traveling across a river,It was estimated to be about the size of a baseball,There was little wind during the observation
witness description: the witness was located across the river from Anoka
